questions.text: Have you ever had an operation before?
questions.hint: This includes any procedure you have received under general or local anaesthetic.
If you can remember, please provide a date. Otherwise provide the rough year or decade if possible.

questions.text: Have you ever had problems with anaesthetics?
questions.hint: Any problems you had whilst having a general anaesthetic, local anaesthetic, spinal or epidural anaesthetic.

questions.text: Have any of your blood-relatives ever had a reaction to anaesthetic?
questions.hint: This may be an allergic reaction to anaesthetic, or certain familial conditions (e.g. malignant hyperpyrexia or suxamethonium apnoea).

questions.text: Please list any known allergies you have?
questions.hint: This may include allergies to medication, certain foodstuffs, or materials (e.g. latex)

questions.text: Do you have, or are you treated for any of the following conditions?
Have you smoked at all in the last six months?
How many units of alcohol do you drink in an average week?
questions.hint: You may wish to use this online calculator to help you [URL: https://www.drinkaware.co.uk/understand-your-drinking/unit-calculator]

questions.text: Do you have transport to get you to hospital?
